html: One way Jehovah shows that he is God first and last is to appoint his covenant people to prefigure in their ancient history the events that occur at the end. Only a true God can orchestrate humanity’s circumstances in that manner, it being a proof of his divinity (Isaiah 41:26; 43:11-13; 45:21; 46:9-10). In other words, whatever set a precedent in the past forms a type of what happens in the future, namely his people’s apostasy, Assyria’s invasion of their lands, Assyria’s world conquest, his people’s captivity, their exodus out of Egypt, wandering in the wilderness, building of the temple, and so forth.
